eas_text: A civil authority has issued A MISSING AND ENDANGERED PERSON ALERT for the following counties or areas: Navajo, AZ; at 04:41 AM ON JAN 16, 2026 Effective until 02:41 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety.  A Turquoise Alert has been issued for Navajo County. The Navajo Police Department is looking for 8 year old Maleeka Boone.  Maleeka is a Native American female, 4 feet 5 inches tall, 50 pounds, with brown eyes and long, brown hair with French braids on both sides.  Maleeka was last seen at 6 PM on 1/15/26 on foot on Cedar Loop in the Coalmine NHA housing area in Coalmine, Arizona.  She is believed to be wearing a red jacket, blue jeans and cowboy boots.  She has not been seen or heard from since.  Her family is concerned for her welfare since it is out of character for her to be gone for an extended period of time.  If you have seen Maleeka, please contact the Navajo Police Department at 928 283 3111 or call 911. If you have contact with the missing person, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
